title: 3G Watchdog Pro 1.23.0
description:
3G Watchdog Pro Version 1.23.0 For Android


Overview:
Pro version of 3G Watchdog mobile data (4G/3G/Edge/GPRSÃ¢â‚¬Â¦) counter / monitoring app, featuring:

* Mobile, roaming & WiFi usage counting
* Advanced data usage prediction
* Billing rules (counts in blocks, ignores uploads, exclude apps, exclude time periods, do not count 2G or 4G)
* Usage history with graph & CSV export

* NEW! Real Time traffic graphs (local, roaming and WiFi)
* Alerts & optional auto-disable of mobile network
* 5 widget styles
* Backup/restore with optional auto-backup
* Redesigned UI
* Account per SIM with auto switch (requires a phone with a SIM Ã¢â‚¬â€œ may not work well with dual-SIM phones).

* Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ and more!

Translated in Chinese Simplified, Chinese Traditional, Danish, Dutch, English, French, German, Greek, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Lituanian, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Spanish, Turkish, more on the way.
